message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  This is a fair price considering the product's worth. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $12000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15000?
